title: Europe needs to think the unthinkable on Nato
description: Conflict over Greenland could destroy the transatlantic alliance, requiring a new European security treaty to replace it
content: Conflict over Greenland could destroy the transatlantic alliance, requiring a new European security treaty to replace it
